sentences.en: Brondello secured the MVP award by scoring 357 points.
sentences.cn: 布朗德罗以357分的得分获得最有价值球员奖。

sentences.en: He accepted the award with characteristic modesty.
sentences.cn: 他以他一贯的谦逊态度接受了奖励。

sentences.en: He deservedly won the Player of the Year award.
sentences.cn: 他理所应当地获得了年度最佳球员奖。

sentences.en: It carried off the Evening Standard drama award for best play.
sentences.cn: 它获得伦敦晚间标准戏剧奖的最佳戏剧奖。

sentences.en: Katie Moore took the ladies' side-saddle award.
sentences.cn: 凯蒂·穆尔获得了最佳女侧骑手奖。

sentences.en: Moodie has been awarded a golf scholarship at the University of Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 穆迪获授夏威夷大学高尔夫奖学金。

sentences.en: Mr Dudley has pledged to give any award to charity.
sentences.cn: 达德利先生已承诺将任何所获的损害赔偿额都捐给慈善机构。

sentences.en: Schools award scholarships for high academic achievement.
sentences.cn: 学校向学业成绩优异者授予奖学金。

sentences.en: She went to New York to receive the award in person.
She will present the trophies to the award winners.
Sue and John were especially thrilled with this award.
sentences.cn: 休和约翰对于获得这个奖项感到兴奋不已。

sentences.en: The award was a fitting tribute to her years of devoted work.
sentences.cn: 这个奖项是对她多年全心全意工作的恰如其分的褒奖。

sentences.en: The Institute's annual award is presented to organizations that are dedicated to democracy and human rights.
sentences.cn: 该协会的年度奖授予致力于民主与人权的组织。

sentences.en: The movie has won a number of awards.
The smart money is on him for the best actor award.
sentences.cn: 内行认为他将获最佳演员奖。

sentences.en: We're flattered and honoured to receive this Doris Day Award.
sentences.cn: 能获得多丽丝·戴奖，我们深感荣幸和光荣。

phrases.tran_cn: 奥斯卡金像奖；学院奖（美国电影艺术科学院颁发的年度奖项）
格莱美奖（美国音乐奖项）

trans.tran_cn: 奖，奖赏，报酬，薪水，加薪，授予，（赔偿）裁定额
trans.tran_en: something such as a prize or money given to someone to reward them for something they have done
to officially give someone something such as a prize or money to reward them for something they have done
to officially give someone something such as a prize or money to reward them for something they have done
